nodes.text: The Ylesian Republic was the planetary government established on Ylesia after it was granted to the Peace Brigade by the Yuuzhan Vong, following the capture of Ylesia, the Ylesian Republic had nominal independence but the Yuuzhan Yong effectively exercised control as a puppet regime. It was led by a President, and governed by a Senate.
Thrackan Sal-Solo was appointed to be the first President of the Ylesian Republic and Commander-in-Chief of the Peace Brigade.
The Ylesian Republic and the Peace Brigade were eventually defeated during the Battle of Ylesia.
